title.rendered: Online Shopping store for your business

content.rendered:
In today’s blog we are going to discuss about online shopping store for your business. In this era shopping style has totally changed people become very choose and need a wide varieties. They are not rely on a single store they need a out of city fashion, out of country fashion as well.

Things become so simple in today. Now you can get the anything from long distance through shipping. If you own a business online store builder makes it easy to sell your products online. Major marketplaces, like Amazon and eBay, come with restrictive seller policies. These venues downplay merchants’ branding to maintain their own homogeneous image.

Hosted E-commerce platforms

Hosted e-commerce platforms mean that the e-commerce platform hosts your online store on its server. There are many platforms available in the market.

Shopify

Shopify is the commonly use platform for building e-commerce web stores. It allows retailers to add many useful features with the integration of add-ons. To add a new feature to your online shop, you can use one of tons of paid or free apps and install it to your website.

Big Commerce

Big Commerce is another platform commonly used after shopify. This platform allows even beginners to create and launch an online store. However, it allows even fewer customization opportunities than Shopify. To give a more personalized look to your store you can also buy a theme in Big Commerce.

Magento

Magento is a self hosted a leading platform popular among medium and big companies.  You can control full functionality and can give a personalized feel to your web store. You need a basic knowledge to design your website in Magento.

WooCommerce

WooCommerce is a Plugin for WordPress with e-commerce functions. The best thing is it is open source, extensible, secure and work on all the devices.

Where you can get your own E-commerce store

There are many things you need to understand before setup your store. There are lot of free templates available on the hosting platforms, but if you need a personalized web store you need a development team for that. To be at top on google your website theme also plays an important role in it.

HawksCode Software Pvt Ltd have 9 years of experience in developing websites, e-commerce stores. They also use technologies like php, javascript, mean stack, CSS apart from this on all CMS platforms shopify, squarespace, magento, bigcommerce, woocommerce. Following are the successfully completed projects.

liquidatedgoods.com
